text: ai eemaan lenevaalo! allaah ke lie khoob uthanevaale, inasaaf kee nigaraanee karanevaale bano aur aisa na ho ki kisee giroh kee shatruta tumhen is baat par ubhaar de ki tum inasaaf karana chhod do. inasaaf karo, yahee dharmaparaayanata se adhik nikat hai. allaah ka dar rakho, nishchay hee jo kuchh tum karate ho, allaah ko usakee khabar hain
